lead_paragraph: The highest reading on the Consumer Confidence Index since August 2007 fueled a broad rise led by tech and travel companies, including cruise lines.

headline.print_headline: Surge in Consumer Confidence Drives Rally After Days of Losses
headline.main: Surge in Consumer Confidence Drives Rally After Days of Losses

snippet: The highest reading on the Consumer Confidence Index since August 2007 fueled a broad rise led by tech and travel companies, including cruise lines....
abstract: Stocks rise after two days of losses as consumer confidence hits nine-year high.
